::: {.content-visible when-profile="en"}
## Summary of that chapter {}

Data visualization is a crucial component of data analysis, enabling the effective communication of insights through graphical representations. This chapter covers the fundamentals of data visualization, including its functions, core principles, and different approaches based on data types and visualization purposes. 

Learners will also explore **advanced visualization techniques**, familiarize themselves with popular **tools**, and analyze a practical **case study**. An annex is provided showcasing a variety of visualization examples to inspire and guide effective visual communication.
:::


::: {.callout-tip collapse="true"}
## Skills you will acquire in this chapter
By completing this chapter, learners will be able to:

- Understand the **purpose and functions** of data visualization.
- Apply **principles of effective visualization** to convey information clearly.
- Select appropriate visualization methods based on **data type** and **analysis purpose**.
- Utilize **advanced visualization techniques** to explore complex datasets.
- Gain hands-on experience with popular **visualization tools**.
- Analyze and interpret **case studies** to improve visualization skills.
- Recognize a wide range of **visualization types** and their applications.
:::
